targetString: Desteya cudahnebû ya heletên KOVÎD-19 di dawî de hate nasîne, di 21 a SIbt de bi 16 haletên tayîdkirî di Lombardî di dest pêdike. Di 22 a Sibat, Encûmena Wezîran yasayeke nû ji bo berçavgirtina belavbûn çî kir, ku pêk tê ji kerentîneya zêdetir ji 50,000 kes di 11 bajarên cuda di bakûra Îtalya.

sourceString: Prime Minister Giuseppe Conte said, "In the outbreak areas, entry and exit will not be provided.
targetString: Serokwezîr Giuseppe Conte got, "Li cihên belavbûn, têketin û derketinê nayê pêşkêşkirin.

sourceString: Suspension of work activities and sports events has already been ordered in those areas."On 4 March, the Italian government ordered the full closure of all schools and universities nationwide as Italy reached 100 deaths.
targetString: Hialwistina çalakîyên kar û bûyerên werzişî di bihûrê de di wî mijarên hate derkirin. "Di roja 4 a Adarê, hikûmeta Îtalya ferman bi daxistina hemî xwendingeh û zenîngehên hemî welat da di demek ku haleta mirina wî welatî gihîşte 100 kes.

sourceString: All major sporting events, including Serie A football matches, were to be held behind closed doors until April, but on 9 March, all sport was suspended completely for at least one month.
targetString: Hemî bûyerên mezinên werzişî, weke yarîyê n fûtbola Serî A, dibe di bin derîyên daxistî heta meha Nîsan bihêtre bihête encamdan, lê di 9 a Adarê, hemîî sporên bi tevahî ji bo herî kêm yek meh hate hilawîstin.

sourceString: On 11 March, Prime Minister Conte ordered stoppage of nearly all commercial activity except supermarkets and pharmacies.On 6 March, the Italian College of Anaesthesia, Analgesia, Resuscitation and Intensive Care (SIAARTI) published medical ethics recommendations regarding triage protocols that might be employed.
targetString: Di 11 a Adar, Serokwezîran Konte, ferman da ku hemî çalakiyên bazirganî ji bilî supermarket û dermanxane bihêne westandin. Di 6 ê Adar de, Koleja Îtalî ya Anesthesia, Analgesia, Resuscitation û Lênihêrînê (SIAARTI) li ser protokolên ciakrin ku dibe ku bicih bibe pêşniyazên etîkolojiya bijîşkî belav kir.

sourceString: On 19 March, Italy overtook China as the country with the most coronavirus-related deaths in the world after reporting 3,405 fatalities from the pandemic.
targetString: Di 19ê Adarê de, Îtalyayê ji Çînê derbas kir wek welatê xwedî zêdetirîn mirinên têkildarî-koronavîrusê li cîhanê piştî ku 3,405 mirinên ji pandemiyê rapor kir.

sourceString: On 22 March, it was reported that Russia had sent nine military planes with medical equipment to Italy.
targetString: Di 22ê Adarê de, hat ragihandin ku Rûsyayê neh balafirên leşkerî li gel ekîpmanên tibî şand Îtalyayê.

sourceString: As of 5 April, there were 128,948 confirmed cases, 15,887 deaths, and 21,815 recoveries in Italy, with the majority of those cases occurring in the Lombardy region.
targetString: Di 5 a Nîsan de, 128,948 haletên teyîdbûyî, 15,887 mirin û 21,815 bêtirbûn di Îtalya hebû, digel piranîya wan ku di deverea Lombardy hebû.

sourceString: A CNN report indicated that the combination of Italy's large elderly population and inability to test all who have the virus to date may be contributing to the high fatality rate.
targetString: Raporeke CNN ragidihîne ku yekkirinveya heşîmet pir pîra Îtalya û nekarîîna têstkirina hemî kesên ku vayrûs hene heta îro dikare bibe alîkara qasa zêdeya mirinê.

sourceString: The United Kingdom's response to the virus first emerged as one of the most relaxed of the affected countries, and until 18 March 2020, the British government did not impose any form of social distancing or mass quarantine measures on its citizens.
targetString: Bersiva Berîtanya di despêk bi vayrûs de weke herî ewlehtirîn welatên berketî bû, û heta 18 a Adar a 2020, hikûmeta Berîtanî hiç cûre durgirtineke civakî an pîvanên kerentîne ya mezin li ser welatîyên xwe bicih nekir.

sourceString: As a result, the government received criticism for the perceived lack of pace and intensity in its response to concerns faced by the public.On 16 March, Prime Minister Boris Johnson made an announcement advising against all non-essential travel and social contact, suggesting people work from home where possible and avoid venues such as pubs, restaurants, and theatres.
targetString: Weke encam, hikûmet bi sedema bersivdana dereng bi nîgeranîyên giştî, hate ber rexnekirin. Di 16 a Adar, Serokwezîr Boris Johnson daxuyanîyek li dijî hemî rêwîtiyê û têkiliya civakî ya ne-bingehîn kir, pêşniyar kir ku heke ku mumkîn be mirov ji malê ku bixebitin û li cîhên wekî bar, xwaringeh û şanoyê dûr bikin.

sourceString: On 20 March, the government announced that all leisure establishments such as pubs and gyms were to close as soon as possible, and promised to pay up to 80% of workers' wages to a limit of £2,500 per month to prevent unemployment in the crisis.On 23 March, the Prime Minister announced tougher social distancing measures, banning gatherings of more than two people and restricting travel and outdoor activity to that deemed strictly necessary.
targetString: Di 20 a Adar, hikûmet ragihand ku hemî damezrandî weke bar û hola werziş dibû bilez bihêne daxistin, û soz da ku 80% a desheqa karmendên bi sinora £2,500 di her meh ji bo rêgirîkirin di kirîzî. Di 23 a Adarê, Serokwezîran ragihand ku pîvan durîgirtina civakî, sinordarbûna kombûna zêdetir ji dû kesan û sinordarkirina geşt û çalakîyên derveyî bi wî rewş ku ciddî pêdivî be.

sourceString: Unlike previous measures, these restrictions were enforceable by police through the issuing of fines and the dispersal of gatherings.
targetString: Wan sinordarîya dijî pîvanên bihûrî di alîyê polî bi rêya derkirina ceza û belavkirina kombûn tête bicihkirin.

sourceString: Most businesses were ordered to close, with exceptions for businesses deemed "essential", including supermarkets, pharmacies, banks, hardware shops, petrol stations, and garages.
targetString: Piranîya karan hatine sparişkirin ku bihêne daxisitn, ji bilî wan ku "pêdivî ne", weke firoşgeh, dermanxane, bank, firoşgehln sextalav, vêstgeh petrol û parkîngên.

sourceString: On 20 January, the first known case of COVID-19 was confirmed in the Pacific Northwest state of Washington in a man who had returned from Wuhan on 15 January.
targetString: Di 20ê Rêbendanê de, bûyera yekem a tê zanîn a COVID-19ê di eyaleta Bakurrojavayê Pasîfîk Washingtonê de hat erêkirin li ba mirovekî ku di 15ê Rêêbendanê de ji Wuhanê vegeriyabû.

sourceString: The White House Coronavirus Task Force was established on 29 January.
targetString: Di 29 a Rêbendan, Hêza Erka Koronavayrus a Koşka Spî çê bû.

sourceString: On 31 January, the Trump administration declared a public health emergency, and placed restrictions on entry for travellers from China.
targetString: Di 31 a Rêbendan, îdare ya Tramp haleta bilez a saxlemî ya giştî ragihand, û sinorên li ser hatina seferkerên ji Çînê dana.

sourceString: On 28 January 2020, the Center for Disease Control—the leading public health institute of the U.S. government—announced they had developed their own testing kit.
targetString: Di 28 a Rêbendana 2020, Navenda Kontrola Nexweşî - enîştîtûya saxlemîya giştî ya hikûmekta Emrîka - ragihand ku wan kîta têstkirina xwe çê kirine.

sourceString: Despite doing so, the United States had a slow start in testing, which obscured the true extent of the outbreak at the time.
targetString: Serbarî encamdana we, Emrîka despêkek hêdî di têstgirtin hebû, ku amara wî demî gumanbar kir.

sourceString: Testing was marred by defective test kits produced by the federal government in February, a lack of federal government approval for non-government test kits (by academia, companies and hospitals) until the end of February, and restrictive criteria for people to qualify for a test until early March (a doctor's order was required thereafter).
targetString: Wî taqikirin bi kîtên xerap di alîyî hikûmeta federal di meha Sibat hate çêkirin, nebûna pesenda hikûmeta federal ji bo kîtên têste na-hikûmî ( bi akadêmî, kompanya û nexweşxaneyên) heta dawîya Sibat, û pîvana sinordarî ji bo xelk ji bo şîyan ji bo têşt heta seretaya Adar (fermana diktor piştî we pêwîst e).

sourceString: By 27 February, The Washington Post reported fewer than 4,000 tests had been conducted in the United States.
targetString: Heta 27 a Sibat ê, Washington Post rapor ki ku 4,000 têst di Emrîka de rû da ye.

sourceString: By 13 March, The Atlantic reported that less than 14,000 tests had been conducted.
targetString: Heta 13 a Dara, Atlantîk rapor ir ku kêmtir ji 14,000 têşt encam bûye.

sourceString: On 22 March, the Associated Press reported: "Many people who have symptoms and a doctor's order have waited hours or days for a test."After the first death in the United States was reported in Washington state on 29 February, Governor Jay Inslee declared a state of emergency, an action that was soon followed by other states.
targetString: Di 22 ê adarê, Associated Press ragihand ku: "Xelkeke zor ku nîşaneyên hene û fermana dixtor ji hene bi sat an rojan li benda têst mane." Piştî ev ku yêkêm haleta mirin di Emrîka di roja 29 a Sibat di wilayt Waşîngton hate raporkirn, fermandar Jay Inslee daxuyanîyeke bilez ragihand, karek ku bi awayeke bilez wilayetên din ji encam dan.

sourceString: Schools in the Seattle area cancelled classes on 3 March, and by mid-March, schools across the country were shutting down.On 6 March 2020, the United States was advised of projections for the impact of the new coronavirus on the country by a group of epidemiologists at Imperial College London.
targetString: Dibistanên li herêma Seattle di 3 ê Adar ê de dersan betal kir, û heya nîvê Adar ê, dibistanên li seranserê welêt hatin rawestandin. Di 6 ê Adar ê, 2020, Emrîka li ser projeya ji bo bandorakirina koronavayrûsê nû li ser welat, ji hêla komek pisporên jêgirtînasî li Imperial College London ve şîret wergirt.

sourceString: On the same day President Trump signed the Coronavirus Preparedness and Response Supplemental Appropriations Act, which provided $8.3 billion in emergency funding for federal agencies to respond to the outbreak.
targetString: Di heman roj de Serok Tramp Yasa ya Amadekarî û Bersiv a Kamil a Guncaw ji bo Koronavayrûs îmze kir, ku $8.3 milyar di bûdceya haleta bilez ji bo ajansên federal ji bo bertekdan bi belavbûn pêşkêş dike.

sourceString: Corporations imposed employee travel restrictions, cancelled conferences, and encouraged employees to work from home.
targetString: Kompanyayên ji sinordarîtîya geşta karmendan bicih kirî ye, konfernasên betal kirî ye, û hana karmendên die ku di xanîyê de kar bikin.

sourceString: Sports events and seasons were cancelled.On 11 March, Trump announced travel restrictions for most of Europe, excluding the United Kingdom, for 30 days, effective 13 March.
targetString: Bûyerên werzîşê û sezon hatin betalkirin. Di 11ê Adarê de, Trump sînorkirinên geryanê ji bo piraniya Ewropayê daxuyand, ku Qraltiya Yekbûyî derve hişt, ji bo 30 rojan, û 13 Adarê ket meriyetê.

sourceString: The following day, he expanded the restrictions to include the United Kingdom and Ireland.
targetString: Roja dawî de, ev sinordaritî zêde kir ji bo berçavgiritna Berîtanya û Îrlenda.

sourceString: On 13 March, he declared a national emergency, which made federal funds available to respond to the crisis.
targetString: Di 13 a Adar ê, ev firyaguzarîya neteweî ragihand, ku budceya federal ji bi bersivdan bi kirîzan çê kirî ye.

sourceString: Beginning on 15 March, many businesses closed or reduced hours throughout the U.S. to try to reduce the spread of the virus.
targetString: Di despêka 15 a Adar, piranîya karên hatine daxistin an dema karî di Emrîka hate kêmkirin ji ber we ku hewil bihête dan ku belavbûna vayrûs kêm bibe.

sourceString: By 17 March, the epidemic had been confirmed in all 50 states and in the District of Columbia.On 23 March, it was reported that New York City had 10,700 cases of the coronavirus, more than the total number of cases in South Korea.
targetString: Ji 17ê Adarê ve, epêdemî li hemî 50 eyaletan û li Navçeya Kolombya-yê hatibû pejirandin. Di 23 Adar de, hate ragihandin ku New York City di 10,700 bûyerên koronavirusê de hebû, ku ji hejmara tevahî ya bûyerên li Koryaya Başûr zêdetir e.

sourceString: On 25 March, the governor said that social distancing seemed to be working, as estimates of case doubling slowed from 2.0 days to 4.7 days.
targetString: Di 25 a Adarê fermandareke got ku xuya dibe dûrbûna civakî di kar dike, ji ber weku pêşbînîyên helate dûcarkirin di 2.0 roj ji bo 4.7 roj kêm bûye.

sourceString: As of 28 March, there were 32,308 confirmed cases in New York City, and 672 people had died from the virus.On 26 March, the United States was reported to have more confirmed coronavirus infection cases than any other country in the world, including China and Italy.As of 8 April, 400,335 cases have been confirmed in the United States, and 12,841 people have died.
targetString: Ji 28ê Adarê ve, li New York City 32,308 bûyerên pejirandî hebûn, û 672 kes bi sedema vayrûsê mirin. Di 26ê Adarê de, Emrîka ragihand ku ji her welatek cîhanê, di nav de Çîn û Îtalya bêtir bûyerên vegirîtina koronavirus piştrast kir. Hesoa di 8 a Nîsanê 400,335 haletê li Emrîka hate teyîdkirin, û 12,841 kes ji mirin.

sourceString: Per media reports on 30 March, U.S. President Trump has decided to extend social distancing guidelines until 30 April.
targetString: Li gorî rapora medyayî di 30 Adarê, Serkoma Emrîka Trapm biryar da ku rêbernameyên dûrbûna civakî heta 30 a Nîsan dirêj bikin.

sourceString: On the same day, the USNS Comfort, a hospital ship with about 1000 beds, made anchor in New York.
targetString: Di hean roj de, USNS Comfort, gemîyeke nexweşxaneya 1000 textî, di Nîw York çê kir.

sourceString: On 3 April, the U.S. had a record 884 deaths due to the coronavirus in a 24-hour period.
targetString: Di 3 a Nîsan, Emrîka 884 mirin bi sedema koronavayrûs di dema 24 demjimêrî de tomar kir.

sourceString: In the state of New York the cases have exceeded 100,000 people on 3 April.The White House has been criticized for downplaying the threat and controlling the messaging by directing health officials and scientists to coordinate public statements and publications related to the virus with the office of Vice-President Mike Pence.
targetString: Li eyaleta New Yorkê di 3ê Nîsanê de hijmara bûyeran ji 100,000ê derbastir bû. Qesra Spî bi biçûkdîtina xetereyê û bi kontrolkirina peyamdayînê tê rexnekirin bi rêya arastekirina peywirdarên fermî yên tenduristiyê û zanyaran ji bo ku ragihandinên raya giştî û weşanên derbarê vîrusê bi ofîca Alîkarê-Serok Mike Pence re kordîne bikin.

sourceString: Overall approval of Trump's management of the crisis has been polarized along partisan lines.
targetString: Pejirandina giştîya birêvebirina Tramp li ser krêz di xetên partîanî de hatîye cemser kirin.

sourceString: Some U.S. officials and commentators criticized the U.S. reliance on importation of critical materials, including essential medical supplies, from China.
targetString: Hinek ji berpirs û şirvekarên Emrîkî li ser girêdayîbûna Emrîa li ser anîna maddeyên girine wekî îmkanatên bijîşkî ji Çînê rexne kirin.

sourceString: An analysis of air travel patterns was used to map and predict patterns of spread and was published in The Journal of Travel Medicine in mid-January 2020.
targetString: Lêkvedanek li ser mînakên sefer ji bo peydakirin û texmînkirina mînakên belavbûn hate bikaranîn û di navenda-Rêbendan a 2020 di The Journal of Travel Medicine hate balavkirin.

sourceString: Based on 2018 information from the International Air Transport Association, Bangkok, Hong Kong, Tokyo, and Taipei had the largest volume of travellers from Wuhan.
targetString: Li gorî agahdariya 2018 ji Civaka Veguhestina Navneteweyî ya Hewayî, Bangkok, Hong Kong, Tokyo û Taipei bi rêwîtiya herî mezin ji Wuhan re hebû.

sourceString: Dubai, Sydney, and Melbourne were also reported as popular destinations for people travelling from Wuhan.
targetString: Dubai, Sydney û Melbourne jî ji bo rêwîtiyên ku ji Wuhan diçin navdar hatine ragihandin.

sourceString: Bali was reported as least able among the 20 most popular destination cities in terms of preparedness, while cities in Australia were considered most able.Australia released its Emergency Response Plan for Novel Coronavirus (COVID-19) on 7 February.
targetString: Li ser esasa amadebûne, Bali di navbera 20 bajarê bû ku kêmtirîn zirar dît, lê bajarên din ji di Awstralya hebûn ku zêdetir karîbûn. Awsturaly Plana Bersive Bileza a xwe ji bo KoronaVayrûsa Nû (KOVÎD-19) di 7 a Sibatê belav kir.

sourceString: It stated that much was yet to be discovered about COVID-19, and that Australia would emphasize border control and communication in its response to the pandemic.
targetString: Ev got ku heya nuha tiştên zêde maye derbarî KOVÎD-19 biihêne zanîn, û Awstalya di bertek bi wî giştgirtî kontrola sinor û têkilî ye.

sourceString: On 21 March, a human biosecurity emergency was declared in Australia.
targetString: Di roja 21 a DAdarî, di Awstralya helate bileza bayoewlehîya meriv hate ragihandin.

sourceString: Owing to the effective quarantine of public transport in Wuhan and Hubei, several countries have planned to evacuate their citizens and diplomatic staff from the area, primarily through chartered flights of the home nation, with Chinese authorities providing clearance.
targetString: Bi sedem kerentîneya bitesîr di veguhestina giştî di Wûhan û Hûbey, hin ji welatan plan danan ku şarûmend û stafên dîplomatkarên xwe di wî derdore vekişînin, di despêk de bi firîna çartrî bi welata xwe, û rayedarên Çînî ji rohnkirin bidin derbarî wî jî.

sourceString: Canada, the United States, Japan, India, Sri Lanka, Australia, France, Argentina, Germany, and Thailand were among the first to plan the evacuation of their citizens.
targetString: Kanada, Emrîk, Japon, Hindistan, Srî Lanka, Awstralya, Ferensa, Arjantîn, Almanya, û Tayland di nav yekem de bûn ku plansazkirina valakirina hemwelatiyên xwe kir.

sourceString: Pakistan has said that it will not be evacuating any citizens from China.
targetString: Pakistan ji got ku ev hîç welatîyek ji Çîna bider nake.

sourceString: On 7 February, Brazil evacuated 34 Brazilians or family members in addition to four Poles, a Chinese person, and an Indian citizen.
targetString: Di 7 ê Sibat ê, Berazîl 34 xelk an endamên malbata xwe tevî çar Polisan, kesek Çînî, û şarûmendeke Hindî derxist.

sourceString: The citizens of Poland, China, and India deplaned in Poland, where the Brazilian plane made a stopover before following its route to Brazil.
targetString: Welatîyên Polenda, Çîn û Hind di Polenda hatin xarê, di cihek ku balafira Berazîlî berî pêketina rêya xwe bi Berazî hate westandin.

sourceString: Brazilian citizens who went to Wuhan were quarantined at a military base near Brasília.
targetString: Welatiyên Brezîlyayê yên ku çûbûn Wuhanê di baregeheke leşkerî ya nêzikî Brasîlyayê hatin karantînekirin.

sourceString: On the same day, 215 Canadians (176 from the first plane, and 39 from a second plane chartered by the U.S. government) were evacuated from Wuhan to CFB Trenton to be quarantined for two weeks.
targetString: Di heman demê de, 215 Kanadayî (176 ji balafira yekem, û 39 jî ji balafira duyem ya ku ji hêla hikumeta D.Y.ê dihat firandin) ji Wuhanê bo CFB Trentonê hatin derxistin da ku ji bo du hefteyan bên karantînakirin.

sourceString: On 11 February, another plane of 185 Canadians from Wuhan landed at CFB Trenton.
targetString: Di 11ê Reşemiyê de, balafireke din a 185 rêwiyên Kanadayî yên ji Wuhanê li CFB trentonê danî xwarê.

sourceString: Australian authorities evacuated 277 citizens on 3 and 4 February to the Christmas Island Detention Centre, which had been repurposed as a quarantine facility, where they remained for 14 days.
targetString: Rayedarên Australyayî do roja 3 û 4 a Sibat de 277 şarûmend ji bo Navenda Bendkirina Dûrgeyea Krîsmes reha kir, ku ji bo îmkana kerentîne hate amade kirin, cihek ku wan ji bo 14 roj di wî man.

sourceString: A New Zealand evacuation flight arrived in Auckland on 5 February; its passengers (including some from Australia and the Pacific) were quarantined at a naval base in Whangaparoa, north of Auckland.
targetString: Firîna texlîye ya Nîw Zîlend di roja 5 a Sibat gihîşte Awklend ê; misafirên wan (wekî hinek ji Awstralya û Zeryaya Aram) di bingehek deryayî di Wangaprauwa, di bakûra Awklend hatine kerentînekirin.

sourceString: On 15 February, the United States announced that it would evacuate Americans aboard the cruise ship Diamond Princess.
targetString: Di 15 a Sibat, Emrîka ragihand ku ev Emrîkîyên nav gemî ya kruza Diamond Princess bider dixe.

sourceString: On 21 February, a plane carrying 129 Canadian passengers who had been evacuated from Diamond Princess landed in Trenton, Ontario.
targetString: Di 21ê Reşemiyê de, balafira ku 129 rêwîyên Kanadayî hilgirtibû ku ji Diamond Princessê hatibûn derxistin li Trenton, Ontarioyê danî xwarê.

sourceString: In early March, the Indian government began evacuating its citizens from Iran.On 14 March a South African Airways aircraft chartered by the South African Government repatriated 112 South African citizens.
targetString: Li destpêka Adarê, hikumeta Hindistanê dest bi derxistina welatiyên xwe yên li Îranê kir. Di 14ê Adarê de balafireke girêdayî Rêhewayên Afrîkaya Başûr 112 welatiyên Afrîkaya Başûr şûnde anî.

sourceString: Medical screening was performed prior to departure, and four South Africans who were showing signs of coronavirus were left behind to mitigate risk.
targetString: Wênedarkirina medîkal beriya veqetînê hat pêkanîn, û çar Afrîkayiyên Başûr ên ku nîşaneyên koronavîrusê nîşan didan li paş hatin hiştin ji bo kêmkirina rîskê.

sourceString: Only South Africans who tested negative were repatriated.
targetString: Tenê xelkên Afrîqayê başûr ku têsa wan nêgetiv bûye hate vegerandin.

sourceString: Test results cleared all the South Africans, including the flight crew, pilots, hotel staff, police and soldiers involved in the humanitarian mission who, as a precautionary measure, all remained under observation and in quarantine for a 14-day period at The Ranch Resort.
targetString: Encamên taqîkrin hemî xelkê Afrîqayî Başûr paqij kir, wekî karmendên firîn, balafirwan, stafa hotêl û serbazên ku di çalakîya merivdost beşdar bû, weke pîvana pêşmerc hemî di bin nêrîn û kerentine ji bo demekî 14 rojî di The Ranch Resort man.

sourceString: On 20 March, the United States began to partially withdrawal its troops from Iraq due to the pandemic.
targetString: Di 20ê Adarê de, Dewletên Yekbûyî dest bi kişandina qismî ya yekîneyên xwe ji Iraqê kir ji ber pandemiyê.

sourceString: On 5 February, the Chinese foreign ministry stated that 21 countries (including Belarus, Pakistan, Trinidad and Tobago, Egypt, and Iran) had sent aid to China.
targetString: Di 5 a Sibar, wezîra derveya Çîn ragihand ku 21 Welat (wekî Belarûs, Pakistn, Trînîdad û Tûbago, Misr û Îran) alîkarî şandin ji bo wî welatî.

sourceString: Some Chinese students at American universities joined together to help send aid to virus-stricken parts of China, with a joint group in the greater Chicago area reportedly managing to send 50,000 N95 masks to hospitals in the Hubei province on 30 January.The humanitarian aid organization Direct Relief, in coordination with FedEx, sent 200,000 face masks along with other personal protective equipment, including gloves and gowns, by emergency airlift to the Wuhan Union Hospital by 30 January.
targetString: Hin ji xwendikarên Çînî di zanîngehên Emrîka bihev re bûn ji bo şandin ji bo beşên vayrûs-girtî yê welatê xwe, bi komeke havbeş di cihê mezintir a Çîkago hatine birêvebirin ku di 30 Rêbendan 50,000 rûbendên N95 bişînên nexweşxaneyîên parêzgeha Hubey. Rêkxistinên merivdostane yên Direct Relief, bi alîkarî ya FedEx, 200,000 rûpêçan digel keresteyên parêzer şandin, wekî desvanik û cilika, û wan bi balafir şandine Nexweşxaneyê Yekyetî ya Wûhan heta 30 Rêbendanê.

sourceString: On 5 February, Bill and Melinda Gates announced a $100 million donation to the WHO to fund vaccine research and treatment efforts along with protecting "at-risk populations in Africa and South Asia".
targetString: Di 5 ê Siba, Bill û Melinda Gates $100 milyoon alîkarîyê WHO kir ku bihayê lêkolîna vaksîn û hewilên derman û piştevanî ji "heşîmeta ber-metirsî di Afrîqa û Başûra Asya".

sourceString: Interaksyon reported that the Chinese government donated 200,000 masks to the Philippines on 6 February, after Senator Richard Gordon shipped 3.16 million masks to Wuhan.
targetString: Interaksyon rapor kir ku hikûmeta Çîn di 6 a Sibatê 200,000 rûpêçan şand ji bo Fîlîpîn, piştî ev ku Senator Richard Gordon 3.16 miyon rûpêçan şand ji bo wûhan.

sourceString: On 19 February, the Singapore Red Cross announced that it would send $2.26 million worth of aid to China.
targetString: Di 19ê Sibatê de, Xaça Sor a Singapûr ragihand ku ew 2.26 milyon dolar alîkar dişîne Çîna.

sourceString: Japan donated one million face masks to Wuhan, Turkey dispatched medical equipment, Russia sent more than 13 tonnes of medical supplies to Wuhan, Malaysia announced a donation of 18 million medical gloves to China, Germany delivered various medical supplies including 10,000 Hazmat suits, and the United States donated 17.8 tons of medical supplies to China and promised an additional $100 million in financial support to affected countries.After cases in China seemed to stabilize, the country has been sending aid to various nations hit by the pandemic.
targetString: Japonyayê yek milyon maskeyên sûretê bexşand Wuhanê, Tirkiyê ekîpmanên tibî bi rê kir, Rûsyayê zêdetirî 13 ton peydeyiyên tibî şand Wuhanê, Malezyayê bexşandina 18 milyon lepikên tibî bo Çînê ragihand, Almanyayê peydeyiyên cur bi cur ên tibî teslîm kir ku tê de 10,000 cilûbergên Hazmat hebûn, û Dewletên Yekbûyî 17.8 ton peydeyiyên tibî bexşand Çînê û sozê $100 alîkariya aborî da ji bo welatên bandor girtî. Piştî ku bûyerên li Çînê ber bi stabîlîzebûnê çûn, niha ew welat alîkariyan dişîne welatên ku pandemiyê lêdayî.

sourceString: In March, China, Cuba and Russia sent medical supplies and experts to help Italy deal with its coronavirus outbreak.
targetString: Di Adarê de, Çîn, Kûba û Rûsyayê peydeyîyên tibî û pispor şandin da ku alîkariya Îtalyayê bikin ji bo çareseriya şewbeya koronavîrusê.

sourceString: Businessman Jack Ma sent 1.1 million testing kits, 6 million face masks, and 60,000 protective suits to Addis Ababa, Ethiopia for distribution by the African Union.
targetString: Bazirrgan Jack Ma 1.1 miylyon kîta têst, 6 milyon rûbendan, û 60,000 cilika parastin şande Adîs Ababa, Etypîya ji bo belavkirin di alîyên Yekyetîya Efrîqî.

sourceString: He later sent 5,000 testing kits, 100,000 face masks and 5 ventilators to Panama.
targetString: Ev di dawî de 5,000 kîta têst, 100,000 rûbendan p 5 dezgehên hewadanê ji bo Panama şand.

sourceString: Ma also donated medical supplies to Canada.The Netherlands, Spain, Turkey, Georgia, and the Czech Republic expressed their concerns over Chinese-made masks and test kits.
targetString: Ma heroa berhemên bijîşkî da Keneda yê. Hollanda, Spanya, Tirkiye, Gurcistan û Komara Çêk nigernîyên xwe derbarê rûbenda û kîtê testên ragihand ku ji hêla Çînê têne anîn.

sourceString: For instance, Spain withdrew 58,000 Chinese-made coronavirus testing kits with an accuracy rate of just 30%, meanwhile, the Netherlands recalled 600,000 Chinese face masks which were defective.
targetString: Wek nimûne, Îspanyayê 58,000 kîtên testê yên malê-Çînê yên rejeya rastderketina wan hema 30% bû paşde şand, ji aliyê din ve, Hollandayê 600,000 maskeyên sûretê yên Çînî paşde bi rê kir ku kêrnehatî bûn.

sourceString: Belgium recalled 100,000 unusable masks, thought to be from China, but were in fact from Colombia.
targetString: Belçîkayê 100,000 maskeyên nayên bikaranîn şûnde bi rê kir, ku ji Çînê dihat zanîn, lê di rastiyê de ji Kolombiyayê bûn.

sourceString: On the other hand, Chinese aid has been well-received in parts of Latin America and Africa.On 2 April, the World Bank launched emergency support operations for developing countries.
targetString: Ji aliyê din ve, alîkariya Çînîyan li deverên Amerîka û Afrîkayê baş hatin pêşwazîkirin. Di 2yê Nîsanê de, Banqeya Cîhanê kargeriyên piştgiriya acîl ji bo welatên pêşde diçin da destpêkirin.

sourceString: The WHO has commended the efforts of Chinese authorities in managing and containing the epidemic.
targetString: WHO hersoa spasîya hewilênn rayedarên Çîn di bîrêvebin û kontrola wî jêrgirtîyê kir.

sourceString: The WHO noted the contrast between the 2002–2004 SARS outbreak, where Chinese authorities were accused of secrecy that impeded prevention and containment efforts, and the current crisis where the central government "has provided regular updates to avoid panic ahead of Lunar New Year holidays".
targetString: WHO dijberîya navbera belavbûna 2002-2004 SARS ragihand, di cihek ku rayedarên çînî gumanbara nihênîkirin bûn ku bibûne rêgir ji kontrol û rêgirî ji kirîza heye, di cihek ku hikûmeta navend "nûkirinên domdar ji bo rêgirîkirin ji panîk di betlanîya SerSala Nûya Heyvî" pêşkêş kir.

sourceString: On 23 January, in reaction to the central authorities' decision to implement a transportation ban in Wuhan, WHO representative Gauden Galea remarked that while it was "certainly not a recommendation the WHO has made", it was also "a very important indication of the commitment to contain the epidemic in the place where it is most concentrated" and called it "unprecedented in public health history".On 30 January, following confirmation of human-to-human transmission outside China and the increase in the number of cases in other countries, the WHO declared the outbreak a Public Health Emergency of International Concern (PHEIC), the sixth PHEIC since the measure was first invoked during the 2009 swine flu pandemic.
targetString: Di roja 23 a Rêbendan, di bersiv be biryara rayedarên navendî ji bo bicihkirina westandina veguhestin di Wûhan, Nûnerê WHO Gauden Galea bi bîr xist ku dema ku ew "bê guman ne pêşniyara WHO kiriye", lê ew jî "nîşana pir girîng e ji bo domandina êpîdemî li cîhê ku herî pir navendê ye" û jê re dibêjin "ne-texmînkirî di dîroka tenduristiya giştî de". Di roja 30 a Rêbendan de, teyîdkirina dawîya veguhestina mirev-ji bo-meriv di derveyê Çîne û zêdebûna hejmara haletan di welatên din jê, WHO ev wek Haleteke Bileza Saxlemî ya Giştî di Nêgeranê di aste Navnetewyî (PHEIC) ragihand, şeşemîn PHEIC di pîvana yekem di 2009-an de hate şandin.

sourceString: WHO Director-General Tedros Adhanom said that the PHEIC was due to "the risk of global spread, especially to low- and middle-income countries without robust health systems.
targetString: Birêveberê Giştî yê WHO Tedros Adhanom got ku PHEIC ji ber "xetera belavbûna gerdûnî, bi taybetli welatên kêm-û navîndahatên pergalên tenduristî yên bihêz bû.

sourceString: In response to the implementations of travel restrictions, Tedros stated that "there is no reason for measures that unnecessarily interfere with international travel and trade" and that the "WHO doesn't recommend limiting trade and movement."
targetString: Di bersiv bi sinordarkirina sefer, Tedros got "hîç sedemek nîne ji bo pîvanên ku seferên navneteweyî û bazirganî bihête encamdan" û "WHO sinordarkirina bazirganî û tevger pêşnîyaz nake.

sourceString: On 5 February, the WHO appealed to the global community for a $675 million contribution to fund strategic preparedness in low-income countries, citing the urgency to support those countries which "do not have the systems in place to detect people who have contracted the virus, even if it were to emerge".
targetString: Di 5 a Sibatê, the WHO daxwaz ji civaka cîhanî kir ku $675 milyon alîkar bihête kirin ji peredana amadekarîya stratêcîk di welatên kêm-dahat, bi pêdîvîya piştevanîkirin di welatên ku "sîstemên ji bo zanîna kesên vegirtî nîne, xwe eger ji dernekete".

sourceString: Tedros further made statements declaring that "we are only as strong as our weakest link" and urged the international community to "invest today or pay more later".On 11 February, the WHO in a press conference established COVID-19 as the name of the disease.
targetString: Tedros pê re daxuyanî da û got “em ancax bi qasî zincîra xwe ya herî lawaz bihêz in” û hişyarî da civaka navnetewî ku “an îro sermiyanê razînin an jî sibê bedeleke girantir bidin”. Di 11ê Reşemiyê de, di daxuyaniyeke çapemeniyê de, WHOyê COVID-19 wek navê nexweşiyê diyar kir.

sourceString: On the same day, Tedros stated that UN Secretary-General António Guterres had agreed to provide the "power of the entire UN system in the response".
targetString: Di heman roj de, Tedros ragihand ku Sekreterê Giştî yê Neteweyên Yekbûyî António Guterres razî bû ku "hêza bersivê ya tevahiya pergala NY bide".

sourceString: A UN Crisis Management Team was activated as a result, allowing coordination of the entire United Nations response, which the WHO states will allow them to "focus on the health response while the other agencies can bring their expertise to bear on the wider social, economic and developmental implications of the outbreak".
targetString: Tîmeke Rêvebiriya Qeyranê ya Neteweyên Yekbûyî di encamê de hat çalakdarkirin, rê da hevkariya berpirsiyariya timamê Neteweyên Yekbûyî, ku WHO diyar dike ku ew ê derfetê bide wan da ku “bala xwe bidin berpirsiyariyên tenduristî her ku saziyên din bikarin pisporiyên xwe ji bo mijûlbûna li ser bandorên şewbeyê yên berfireh ên civakî, aborî û pêşdeçûnî bi kar bînin”.

sourceString: On 14 February, a WHO-led Joint Mission Team with China was activated to provide international and WHO experts on the ground in China to assist in the domestic management and evaluate "the severity and the transmissibility of the disease" by hosting workshops and meetings with key national-level institutions and to conduct field visits to assess the "impact of response activities at provincial and county levels, including urban and rural settings".On 25 February, the WHO declared that "the world should do more to prepare for a possible coronavirus pandemic," stating that while it was still too early to call it a pandemic, countries should nonetheless be "in a phase of preparedness".
targetString: Di 14 Sibat de, Tîmek Mîsyonên Hevbeş a WHO-yê digel Çîn hate aktîf kirin da ku pisporên navneteweyî û WHO li ser erdê li Çîn peyda bikin ku di rêveberiya navxweyî de alîkar bin û di rêvebirina navxweyî de û "giran û veguhestina nexweşî" binirxînin û bi mezavû karkiran û civînên bi saziyên serekîyên neteweyî û rêgirtina serdanên zevî binirxînin ku di wan "bandora çalakiyên bersivê di asta parêzgehan û wîlayetan de, di nav de avahiyên bajêr û gundî" binirxînin. Di 25 Sibat, WHO ragihand ku "divê cîhan xwe ji bo giştgirtîya koronavarûsê mumkîn amade bike," herosa diyar kir ku her çend hîn zû bû ku ew jê re giştgirtî navbîr bikin, pêdivî ye ku welatên "di qonaxa amadebûnê de" bin.

sourceString: In response to a developing outbreak in Iran, the WHO sent a Joint Mission Team there to assess the situation.On 28 February, WHO officials said that the coronavirus threat assessment at the global level would be raised from "high" to "very high", its highest level of alert and risk assessment.
targetString: Wek bersiva şevbeya ku li Îranê pêşde diçe, WHOyê Tîmeke Hevpar a Peywirdar şande wê welatê da ku rewşê binirxînin. Di 28ê Reşemiyê de, rayedarên WHOyê gotin ku asta gerdûnî ya xetereya koronavîrusê dê ji “bilind” derxînin asta “herî bilind”, an ku asta herî bilind a hişyarî û nirxandina xetereyê.

sourceString: Mike Ryan, executive director of the WHO's health emergencies program, warned in a statement that "This is a reality check for every government on the planet: Wake up.
targetString: Mike Ryan, gerînendeyê rêvebiriya bernameya tenduristiya acîl ya WHOyê, di daxuyaniyekê de hişyar da û got “Ev venêrîneke rastiyê ye ji bo her hikumeta li ser rûyê dinyayê: Hişyar bin.

sourceString: This virus may be on its way and you need to be ready," urging that the right response measures could help the world avoid "the worst of it".
targetString: Heye ku vayrûs di rêya xwe be û pêdivî be amade bibî, "bi baskirina ev ku pîvanên bersiva rast dikare alîkar a cîhan "xeraptir ji wî" be.

sourceString: Ryan further stated that the current data did not warrant public health officials to declare a global pandemic, saying that such a declaration would mean "we're essentially accepting that every human on the planet will be exposed to that virus."
targetString: Ryan pê re daxuyand ku daneyên heyî ji rayedarên tendurîstî yên gel re misoger nakin ku pandemiyeke gerdûnî îlan bikin, û got ku îlankirineke bi vî rengî dê bê vê wateyê ku “em bi awayekî esasî qebûl dikin her mirovê li ser rûyê dinyayê dê tûşî wê vîrusê bibe.”

sourceString: On 11 March, the WHO declared the coronavirus outbreak a pandemic.
targetString: Di 11 a Adarê, WHO belavbûna koronavayrusê weke giştgîrîyek ragihand.

sourceString: The Director-General said that the WHO was "deeply concerned both by the alarming levels of spread and severity, and by the alarming levels of inaction".The WHO has faced significant criticism for what is seen as inadequate handling of the pandemic, including the late declaration of a public health emergency and the classification of the virus as a pandemic.
targetString: Sekreterê-Giştî got ku WHO “gelekî bi fikar e hem bi asta tirsnak a belavbûn û tundiyê, û hem jî bi astên tirsnak ên bêtevgerbûnê”. WHO rastî rexneyeke berbiçav hat ji ber xebatên wê yên ku wek nebes hatin dîtin di hewldana xwe ya li gel pandemiyê de, ku di nav wan rexneyan de îlankirina dereng a rewşa acîl a tenduristiya gel û senifandina vîrusê ya wek pandemî jî hene.

sourceString: The backlash included a petition for the WHO Director-General Tedros Adhanom to tender his resignation, signed by 733,000 people as of 6 April.
targetString: Ev bersiv pêk tê ji nameyek jibo Seroka Giştî ya WHO Tedros Adhanom bi pêşnîyaza derkrina wî, û 733,000 kes ji di 6 a Nîsan ev ji îmze kirin.

sourceString: On 26 March 2020, dozens of UN human rights experts emphasized respecting the rights of every individual during the COVID-19 pandemic.
targetString: Di 26 a Adarê 2020 de, çend pisporên mafe meivê NY li ser rêzgirtina mafe her kes di dem giştgirbûna KOVÎD-19 terkîz kir.

sourceString: The expert group stated that everyone is entitled to life-saving interventions and the government holds this responsibility.
targetString: Koma pisporan destnîşan kirin ku herkes xwedî mafê tewdîrên jiyan-parastinê ye û hikumet vê berpirsiyariyê digire ser xwe.

sourceString: The group stressed that the lack of resources or health insurance should never serve as a justification for discrimination against a specific group.
targetString: Ev kom ragihand ku nebûna çavkanî an sigorta saxlemî nabe weke biryardan li ser cudahkarî dijî komeke taybet be.

sourceString: The experts underscored that every individual has the right to health, including people with disabilities, belonging to minority groups, older people, internally displaced people, the homeless, those living in extremely poor conditions, people in detention, as well as refugees and other unspecified groups in need of government support.
targetString: Wan pispoer teyîd kir ku her kes mafa saxlemî heye, weke kesên kêmendam, ser bi komên kemîne, kesên pîr, penaberên navxwe, bêxanî, wan kesên ku di doxeke hejarî de ne, kesên bendkirî, herosa penaberên û komên netaybetkirina din di pêdîvîya piştevanîya hikûmet.

sourceString: International governmental organizations are addressing the economic and social impacts of the COVID-19 crisis.
targetString: Rêkxistina Hikumeta Navneteweyî bandorên îkonomî û civakî ya qeyrana KOVÎD-19 bas dikin.

sourceString: The Organisation for Economic Co-operation and Development has launched a platform to provide timely and comprehensive information on policy responses in countries around the world, as well as viewpoints and advice.
targetString: Rêkxistina Alîkarîya Aborî û Pêşketin platformek ji bo pêşkêşkirina zanyarîya bilez û giştgîrr li ser bersivên rêbaz di welatên derdor, herosa nêrîn û rêberî ji bişîne.

sourceString: From policies to strengthen health systems and the world economy to addressing the effects of lockdown and restrictions on travel, the digital hub includes a Country Policy Tracker, and aims to help countries learn from each other and to facilitate a co-ordinated global response to the coronavirus challenge.
targetString: Ji îdareyê ta bihêzkirina sîstema tenduristiyê û aboriya cîhanê ji bo çareserkirina bandorên tecrîtê û sînorkirinên li ser geryanê, navenda dîjîtal Şopînereke Îdareya Welêt dihundirîne, û armanc dike ku alîkariya welatan bike da ku ji hev hîn bibin û derfetên bersivên gerdûnî yên kordîne yên dijî tekoşîna koronavîrusê pêkan bikin.

sourceString: The Chinese government has been criticized by the United States, UK Minister for the Cabinet Office Michael Gove, and Brazil President Jair Bolsonaro's son Eduardo Bolsonaro for its handling of the pandemic, which began in the Chinese province of Hubei.
targetString: Hikumeta Çîn ji hêla Emrîka, Wezîrê Bergiriya Berîtanya Michael Kove, û serokê Brazîl, Jair Bolsonaro kurê Eduardo Bolsonaro ji bo birêvebirina giştgîrbûn, ku li parêzgeha Hubei ya Çîn dest pê kir, rexne kirin.

sourceString: A number of provincial-level administrators of the Communist Party of China (CPC) were dismissed over their handling of the quarantine efforts in Central China, a sign of discontent with the political establishment's response to the outbreak in those regions.
targetString: Hijmareke rêvebirên asta-bajarî yên Partiya Komunîst a Çînê (CPC) ji kar hatin dûrxistin ji ber kiryarên xwe yên têkildarî hewlên karantînayê li Navenda Çînê, wek nîşaneyeke nerazîbûnê ya ji bo bersivdana îdareya siyasî ya dijî şewbeya li wan herêman.

sourceString: Some commentators believe that this move was intended to protect Chinese Communist Party general secretary Xi Jinping from the public's anger over the coronavirus outbreak.
targetString: Hinek ji şirovekarên bi wî bawer in ku ev veguhestin bi armanca parastina skirêtera giştî ya Parta Komonîst a Çîn SÎ Jînpîng di xeşima giştî li belavbûna koronavayrusê ye.

sourceString: Some Chinese officials, e.g. Zhao Lijian rejected an earlier acknowledgement of the coronavirus outbreak starting in Wuhan, in favour of conspiracy theories about the COVID-19 originating from the U.S. or Italy.
targetString: Hin rayedarên Çînî, wek mînak Zhao Lijian pêzaniya pêşde ya şewbeya koronavîrusê ya ku li Wuhanê destpê kir red kir, derbarê teoriyên komployê yên derheqê COVID-19ê ku ji D.Y.ê û Îtalyayê derketin.

sourceString: The U.S. administration of Donald Trump has referred to the coronavirus as "Chinese virus" or "Wuhan virus" saying that China's "censorship supercharged a virus that has now turned into a global pandemic", which has in turn been criticized by some critics as racism and "distract[ing] from his administration's failure to contain the disease".
targetString: Rêveberiya D.Y.ê ya Donald Trump wek “vîrusa Çînî” an jî “vîrusa Wuhanê” qala koronavîrusê dike û dibêje ku “sansura Çînê vîrus bihêz kir ku niha bûye pandemiyeke gerdûnî,” vêca ew gotin bi dorê ji hêla rexnegiran wek nijadperestî tê rexnekirin û “kêmasiya rêveberiya xwe ya astengkirina nexweşiyê vedişêre”.

sourceString: The Daily Beast obtained a U.S. government cable outlining a communications stratagem with apparent origins in the National Security Council, with the strategy being quoted as "Everything is about China.
targetString: The Daily Beast kêbla hikûmeta Emrikî bidest anî ku lêbeka pêwendî bi çavkanîyên zelal di Encumena Ewlehîya Neteweyî, bi stratêjîyek ku bi nava "Hemî tiştên derbarî Çîn hate nasandin.

sourceString: We're being told to try and get this messaging out in any way possible, including press conferences and television appearances."Outlets such as Politico, Foreign Policy, and Bloomberg have claimed that China's efforts to send aid to virus-stricken countries is part of a propaganda push for global influence.
targetString: Ji me re tê gotin ku em hewl bidin û vê peyamdariyê derve bihêlin bi hemû rêyên pêkan, daxuyaniyên çapemeniyê û derketina ber televizyonê jî tê de. “Pêşkêşkarên wek Politicio, Foreign Policy, û Bloombergê angaşt dikin ku hewldana Çînê ya şandina alîkariyê ji bo welatên vîrus-lêxistî parçeyeke propagandayê ya ji bo bandora gerdûnî ye.

sourceString: EU foreign policy chief Josep Borrell warned that there is "a geo-political component including a struggle for influence through spinning and the 'politics of generosity'".
targetString: Serokê îdareya derve yê YEyê Josep Borrell hişyarî da ku “hêmaneke jeo-polîtîk heye ku tekoşîna ji bo bandorkirinê ya bi rêya fitnetiyê û ‘polîtkayên comerdiyê’” jî tê de ye.

sourceString: Borrell also said that "China is aggressively pushing the message that, unlike the US, it is a responsible and reliable partner."
targetString: Borrell herosa got "Çîn ev peyam bi ciddî dide ku, cuda ji nêrîna Emrîka, ev hevaleke berpirsyar û pêbawer e."

sourceString: China has also called for the US to lift its sanctions off of Syria, Venezuela and Iran, while reportedly sending aid to the latter two countries.
targetString: Çînê jî bang li DYê kir da ku kirdariyên xwe ji ser Suriye, Venezuela û Iranê rake, her ku hat ragihandin ku alîkariyan ji wan her du welatên dawî re dişîne.

sourceString: Jack Ma's donation of 100,000 masks to Cuba was blocked by US sanctions on 3 April.
targetString: Herosa pêdana 100,000 rûpêçan ji bo Kûba bi sedem sizayên Emrîka di 3 a Nîsanê hate westandin.

sourceString: US authorities have also been accused of diverting aid meant for other nations to their own country.
targetString: Rayedarên Emrîkî ji hatine gumanbarkirin ku alîkarîyên ji bo neteweyên din bi welata xwe birine.

sourceString: And there have been mask-related disputes reported between other countries, such as Germany, Austria and Switzerland; and the Czech Republic and Italy.
targetString: Û derketina niqaşên têkildarî-maskeyan hat raporkirin navbera welatên din, wek Almanya, Avusturya û Swîsre; û Komara Çek û Îtalyayê.

sourceString: In addition, Turkey seized hundreds of ventilators destined for Spain.
targetString: Digel vê yekê, Tirkiyeyê bi sedan dezgehên hewadanê ji bo Spanyayê şand.

sourceString: In early March, the Italian government criticized the European Union's lack of solidarity with coronavirus-affected Italy.
targetString: Di despêka meha Adar, hikûmeta Îtala Yekyetî ya Ewrûpa bi nebûna hevgirî di Italya berketîa koroanvayrûs rexne kir.

sourceString: Maurizio Massari, Italy's ambassador to the EU, said that "Only China responded bilaterally.
targetString: Maurizio Massari, balyozê Îtalyan ê YEyê, got ku “Bi tenê Çînê dualî bersiv da.

sourceString: Certainly, this is not a good sign of European solidarity."
targetString: Bêguman, ev ne nîşaneyek ji serbazitî ya Ewrûpî ye."

sourceString: On 22 March, after a phone call with Italian Prime Minister Giuseppe Conte, Russian president Vladimir Putin arranged the Russian army to send military medics, special disinfection vehicles, and other medical equipment to Italy.
targetString: Di 22ê Adarê de, piştî axaftineke telefonê li gel Serokwezîrê Îtalyan Giuseppe Conte, serokê Rûsyayê Vladimir Putin pîlansazî çêkir ku artêşa Rûs medîkalên leşkerî, aletên taybet ên dezenfektekirinê, û ekîpmanên din ên tibî bişîne Îtalyayê.

sourceString: Italy's La Stampa newspaper cited an anonymous "high-level political source" that 80 percent of Russia's aid was "useless or of little use to Italy".
targetString: Rojnameya Îtalîya a Stampa bi amaje bi "çavkanîyeke sîyasî di asta mezin "ragihand ku 80 ji sedî alîkarîyên Rûsya "nekarîger and bi karîgerîya kêm ji bo Îtalya bû ye".

sourceString: The source accused Russia of embarking on a "geopolitical and diplomatic" charm offensive.
targetString: Çavkanî Rûsîya bi hewil ji bo efsûna "cîyoplîtîk û dîplomatîkî" gumanbar kir.

sourceString: The President of Lombardy, Attilio Fontana, and Italian Foreign Minister Luigi Di Maio dismissed the media reports and expressed their gratitude.
targetString: Serokê Lombardiya, Attilio Fontana, û Wezîrê Derve yê Îtalî Luigi Di Maio raporên medyayê qut kirin û spasiyên xwe anîn ziman.

sourceString: Russia also sent a cargo plane with medical aid to the United States.
targetString: Rûsyayê di heman demê de balafireke kargo ya bi alîkariyên tibî şand Dewletên Yekbûyî.

sourceString: Kremlin spokesman Dmitry Peskov said that "when offering assistance to US colleagues, [Putin] assumes that when US manufacturers of medical equipment and materials gain momentum, they will also be able to reciprocate if necessary."
targetString: Berdevkê Kremlînê Dimitry Peskov got ku “dema alîkarî ji hevpîşeyên DYê kirine, [Putin] pejirandiye ku dema hilberînerên hecetên medîkal û materyalan ên DY karê xwe lezgîn bikin, ew ê jî bersivê bidinê eger pêwîst bike.

sourceString: The planned NATO "Defender 2020" military exercise in Germany, Poland, and the Baltic states, the largest NATO war exercise since the end of the Cold War, will be held on a reduced scale.
targetString: Cerîbandina şêwaza leşkerî ya plankirî ya "Defender 2020" ya li Almanya, Polonya û dewletên Baltikê, pileya herî mezin a xebata şer a NATO-yê ji dawiya şerê Sar, di asteke daxistî de tête sazkirin.

sourceString: The Campaign for Nuclear Disarmament's general secretary Kate Hudson criticized the Defender 2020 exercise: "In the current public-health crisis, it jeopardizes the lives not only of the troops from the US and the many European countries participating but the inhabitants of the countries in which they are operating."The Iranian government has been heavily affected by the virus, with around two dozen parliament members infected as well as fifteen other current or former political figures.
targetString: Skêrtara giştî ya Nehêştinia Çeka Navekî Kate Hudson bi rexnegiritin ji karak Defender di 2020 got: "Di krîza heyî ya saxlemî ya cîhanî, ev ne tenê jîyan hêzên Emrîkî û hinek ji rûniştinivanên Ewrûpî dixe metirsî, lê jiyana wan kes ku li vir jî dijîn dixe bin metirsî yê." Hikûmet Îranê piranî ket ber tesîra wî vayrûsê, hersa nêzîkî bist û çar kes ji endam perleman û panizdeh berpirsên sîyasî ya heyî an bihûrî de vegirtî bûn.

sourceString: Iran's President Hassan Rouhani wrote a public letter to world leaders asking for help on 14 March 2020, saying that his country is struggling to fight the outbreak due to lack of access to international markets as a result of the United States sanctions against Iran.The outbreak has prompted calls for the United States to adopt social policies common in other wealthy countries, including universal health care, universal child care, paid family leave, and higher levels of funding for public health.
targetString: Serokomarê Îranê, Hesen Rûhanî, nameyek gelemperî ji serokên cîhanî re şand ku di 14 Adar 2020 de alîkariyê bixwaze, û ragihand ku welatê wî ji ber nebûna gihîştina bazarên navdewletî wekî encama cezayên Emrîka yên li dijî Iranê bi dijwarî di belavbûne têdikoşe. Wî belavbûne, han da ku bang bikin ji Emrîkayê ku siyasetên civakî yên hevpar li welatên din ên dewlemend bigire, di nav de lênihêrîna tenduristî ya gerdûnî, lênihêrîna zarokan a gerdûnî, pêdana pereya betlaneya malbatî û astên herî bilind di tenduristiya giştî.

sourceString: Political analysts anticipated it may negatively affect Donald Trump's chances of re-election in the 2020 presidential election.Diplomatic relations between Japan and South Korea worsened due to the pandemic.
targetString: Dahûrînerên polîtîkayê angaşt kirin ku dibe ew bi awayekî neyînî bandorê li ser şansê ve-hilbijartina Donald Trump a di hilbijarina serokatiyê ya 2020an de nîşan bide. Têkiliyên dîplomatîk ên navbera Japonya û Koreya Bşûr ji ber pandemiyê xirab bûn.

sourceString: South Korea criticized Japan's "ambiguous and passive quarantine efforts" after Japan announced anybody coming from South Korea will be placed in two weeks' quarantine at government-designated sites.
targetString: Koreya Başûr piştî ku Japonya ragihand ku kesek ji Koreya Başûr tê, dê "hewlên kerentînekirina nerast û nezanî" ya Japonê rexne kir û dê di du hefteyan de li qadên qefilandî yên li hikûmetê were danîn.

sourceString: The South Korean society was initially polarized on President Moon Jae-in's response to the crisis.
targetString: Civaka Koryaya Başûr di despêk de li ser bersiva Serkoma Moon Jay-în hate cemserkrinirin.

sourceString: Many Koreans signed petitions either calling for the impeachment of Moon over what they claimed to be government mishandling of the outbreak, or praising his response.The pandemic has allowed countries to pass emergency legislation in response.
targetString: Gelek Xelkê Koryaya daxwazname nivîsandin ku destkişandina Moon a ji kar dixwestin ku mudaheleya hikumetê ya şewbeyê wek kêmasî didîtin, an jî pesnê wê didan. Pandemiyê destûr da welatan wek bersiv qanûnên acîl derxînin.

sourceString: Some commentators have expressed concerns that it could allow governments to strengthen their grip on power.
targetString: Hinek ji şirovekarên nîgeranî ragihandin ku ev dikare rê bidde hikûmetên ku hêza xwe zêdetir bikin.

sourceString: In Hungary, its parliament voted to allow the prime minister, Viktor Orbán, to rule by decree indefinitely, suspend parliament as well as elections and punish those deemed to have spread false information about the virus and the government's handling of the crisis.
targetString: Li Macarîstanê, parlamentoyê deng da ji bo ku destûrê bide serokwezîr,Viktor Orbán, bi telîmatan bi awayekî nekifşe rêveberiyê bike, parlementoyê û hilbijartinan bide seknandin û kesên ku bi belavkirina agahiyên nerast derbarê koronavîrusê û xebatên hikumetê yên têkildarî qeyranê de tên tawanbarkirin ceza bike.

sourceString: The coronavirus outbreak has been blamed for several instances of supply shortages, stemming from globally increased usage of equipment to fight the outbreaks, panic buying, and disruption to factory and logistic operations.
targetString: Belavbûna koronavayrûs ji bo mînakên weke kêmbûna anîn, bi sedema bikaranîna zêde ya îmkanat ji bo rûbirûbûna belavbûn, kirîna bi tirs, û îxlal di kargeh û çalakîyên locîstîk hate tawanbar kirin.

sourceString: The United States Food and Drug Administration has issued warnings about shortages of drugs and medical equipment due to increased consumer demand and supplier disruption.
targetString: Îdera ya Xwarin û Derman a Emrîka agahdarîyek derbarê kêmbûna derman û alavên dermanî bi sebeba xwasta zêdebûûya mişter û xerapbûna belavkirin derkir.

sourceString: Several localities also witnessed panic buying that led to shelves being cleared of grocery essentials such as food, toilet paper, and bottled water, inducing supply shortages.
targetString: Li çend cihan panîka kirînê hat dîtin ku di encamê de tiştên esasî yên li dikanan heyî yên wek xwarin, kaxezên tuvaletê, ava şûşekirî hatin paqijkirin, û bû kêmasiya peydeyiyan.

sourceString: The technology industry in particular has been warning about delays to shipments of electronic goods.
targetString: Pîşezasîya teknolocya bi taybet erbarî derengketina nardina berhemên eliktironî agahdarî dide.

sourceString: According to WHO director-general Tedros Adhanom, the demand for personal protection equipment has risen 100-fold.
targetString: Li gorî birêvebera giştî ya WHO Tedros Adhanom, xwast amûrên parastina kesane bi 100 qatî zêde bûye.

sourceString: This demand has led to the increase in prices of up to twenty times the normal price and also induced delays on the supply of medical items for four to six months.
targetString: Ev xwast bûye sedema zêdebûna nirxan bi bîst caran di nirxa asayî û herosa ev ji bûye sedema derengketina dabeşkirina perçeyên bijîşkê ji çar heta şeş mehê.

sourceString: It has also caused a shortage of personal protective equipment worldwide, with the WHO warning that this will endanger health workers.
targetString: Ev ji ûbû sedema kêmbûna amûrên parastina kesan di cîhan de, û WHO agahdarî dide ku ev li ser saxlemîya karkerên metirsî saz dike.

sourceString: In Australia, the pandemic provided a new opportunity for daigou shoppers to sell Australian products into China.
targetString: Di Ostralya de giştgirbûn derfeteke nû çê kir ji bo xwedîyên firoşgehên daigou ku berhemên xwe bifirotin Çînê.

sourceString: The activity has created a shortage of baby formula in some supermarkets and was subsequently banned by the Australian government.Despite the high prevalence of COVID-19 cases in Northern Italy and the Wuhan region, and the ensuing high demand for food products, both areas have been spared from acute food shortages.
targetString: Çalakiyê kêmasiyeke xwarina bebikan di hin supermarketan de derxist holê û piştre jî ji aliyê hikumeta Avustralyayî hat qedexekirin. Digel belavbûna bilind a bûyerên COVID-19 li Bakurê Îtalyayê û li herêma Wuhanê, û digel daxwaziya bilind a hilberînên xwarinê ya domdar, her du herêm jî ji kêmasiya giran a xwarinê hatin parastin.

sourceString: Measures by China and Italy against the hoarding and illicit trade of critical products have been successful, avoiding acute food shortages that were anticipated in Europe as well as in North America.
targetString: Hewilên Çîn û Îtalya di hember veşartin û ticareta neyasayîya berhmenên giring serketî bû, û rê girt ji kêmbûna xwarin ku hatibûye mezendekirin di Ewrupa û Bakûrê Emrîkayê.

sourceString: Northern Italy with its significant agricultural production has not seen a large reduction, but prices may increase according to industry representatives.
targetString: Bakurê Îtalyayê yê ku xwedî hilberîneke berbiçav a çandiniyê ye kêmkirineke mezin nedît, lê li gor temsîldarên endustriyê dibe ku biha bilind bibin.

sourceString: Empty food shelves were only encountered temporarily, even in Wuhan city, while Chinese government officials released pork reserves to assure sufficient nourishment of the population.
targetString: Refên vala yên xwarinê bi tenê bi awayekî demborî hat dîtin, heta li bajarê Wuhanê jî, her ku rayedarên hikumeta Çînî rezervên goştê berazê pêşkêş kirin da ku xwarina bi têrê ya gelheyê teqez bikin.

sourceString: Similar laws exist in Italy requiring food producers to keep reserves for such emergencies.
targetString: Yasayên wekhev ji di Îtalya heye ku dabinkerên xwarin dibe ku xiznên ji bo wî haletên bilez hebin.

sourceString: Damage to the global economy has been felt in China: according to a media report on 16 March, the economy in China was very hard hit in the first two months of 2020 due to the measures taken by the government to curtail virus spread, and retail sales plunged 20.5%.
targetString: Zirara ji bo aboriya gerdûnî li Çînê hat hîskirin: li raporeke medyayê ya 16ê Adarê, aboriya li Çînê di du mehên destpêkê yên 2020 de derbeke giran xwar ji ber pîvanên ji hêla hikumetê hatin wergirtin da ku belavbûna vîrusê asteng bike, û firotinên perakende ket ta rejeya 20.5%.

sourceString: As mainland China is a major economy and manufacturing hub, the viral outbreak has been seen to pose a major destabilizing threat to the global economy.
targetString: Her ku parzemîna Çînê aboriyeke mezin û navendeke hilberînê ye, şewbeya vîral wek xetereyeke gewre ya destabîlîzeker hat dîtin ji bo aboriya gerdûnî.

sourceString: Agathe Demarais of the Economist Intelligence Unit has forecast that markets will remain volatile until a clearer image emerges on potential outcomes.
targetString: Agathe Demarais di Yekîtiya Ragihandina Aborîst pêşbînî kiriye ku dê bazar bimîne heta ku wêneyeke zelal li ser encamên karê derdikeve.

sourceString: In January 2020, some analysts estimated that the economic fallout of the epidemic on global growth could surpass that of the 2002–2004 SARS outbreak.
targetString: Di Rêbendana 2020an de, hin analîzkeran texmîn kirin ku dibe daketina aborî ya gerdûnî ya ji ber epîdemiyê ji ya şewbeya SARSa 2002–2004an derbastir bike.

sourceString: One estimate from an expert at Washington University in St. Louis gave a $300+ billion impact on the world's supply chain that could last up to two years.
targetString: Texmînek li pisporeke di Zanîngeha Washington di St. Louis ragihand ku bandoerke $300+ milyar li ser zincîreya beşkirina cihanî heye ku dikare heta dû sal be.

sourceString: The Organization of the Petroleum Exporting Countries (OPEC) reportedly "scrambled" after a steep decline in oil prices due to lower demand from China.
targetString: Rêxistina Welatên Henardekerên Neftê (OPEC) ragihand ku piştî peşbirkek berbiçav, bihayên neftê ji ber daxwaza kêmtir Çînê, "xuşî".

sourceString: Global stock markets fell on 24 February due to a significant rise in the number of COVID-19 cases outside mainland China.
targetString: Bazarên borseyê yên gerdûnî di 24ê Reşemiyê de ketin xwar ji ber bilindbûna berbiçav a hijmara bûyerên COVID-19 ên li derveyê parzemîna Çînê.

sourceString: On 27 February, due to mounting worries about the coronavirus outbreak, various U.S. stock indexes including the NASDAQ-100, the S&P 500 Index, and the Dow Jones Industrial Average posted their sharpest falls since 2008, with the Dow falling 1,191 points, the largest one-day drop since the financial crisis of 2007–08.
targetString: Di 27 a Sibat, ji ber zêdebûna nîgeranî derbarî belavbûna koronavayrûs, hinek îndêksa bazara Emrîkî wek NASDAQ-100, S&P 500 Index, û Dow Jones kêmtirîn asta daşikandin di 2008 hebûye, Dow bi dabezandina 1,191 xalîm mezintirîna daşikandin heya kirîza aborîya 2007-08 bûye.

sourceString: All three indexes ended the week down more than 10%.
targetString: Hemî îndêxê di dawî ya hefte bi zêdetir ji 10% bidawî hatin.

sourceString: On 28 February, Scope Ratings GmbH affirmed China's sovereign credit rating, but maintained a Negative Outlook.
targetString: Di 28ê Sibatê de, Scope Ratings GmbH erêkirina îttîfaqa krediya serwer a Çînê pejirand, lê Nêrînek negatîf parast.

sourceString: Stocks plunged again based on coronavirus fears, the largest fall being on 16 March.
targetString: Borse jî ji ber fikarên koronavîrusê ketin, daketina jêr a mezintirîn di 16ê Adarê de pêk hat.

sourceString: Many consider an economic recession to be likely.
targetString: Piranîya vekişîna aborî gumnbar dizanî.

sourceString: Economist Mohamed El-Erian praised central banks' and states' timely emergency measures.
targetString: Mohamed El-Erian a aborînas, pîvanln bilez bankên navendî û wilayetên pesnand.

sourceString: Central banks are reacting more quickly than they did to the 2008 financial crash.
targetString: Bankên navendêî gelek bileztir ji wan ku di têkçûna aborî ya sala 2008 bersiv didin.

sourceString: Tourism is one of the worst affected sectors due to travel bans, closing of public places including travel attractions, and advice of governments against any travel all over the world.
targetString: Tûrîzm yek ji wan sektoran e ku xirabtirîn bandor girtî ye ji ber derbendên geryanê, girtina mekanên gel ku cazibeyên seyahatê jî tê de, û pêşniyazên hikumetan ên li dij geryanê li seranserî cîhanê.

sourceString: As a consequence, numerous airlines have cancelled flights due to lower demand, including British Airways, China Eastern Airlines, and Qantas, while British regional airline Flybe collapsed.
targetString: Wek encam, çendîn rêhewayan firînên xwe betal kirin ji ber daxwazên kêm, ku di nav wan de British Airways, China Eastern Airlines, û Qantas hebûn, her ku rêhewaya Brîtanî ya herêmî Flybeyê îflas kir.

sourceString: The impact on the cruise line industry was at a level never seen before.
targetString: Bandora ser pîşesazîya krûz di astek bû ku di bihûrî de nebû ye.

sourceString: Several train stations and ferry ports have also been closed.
targetString: Çendîn wêstgehên trên û nadina kelûpelên hatine daxistin.

sourceString: The epidemic coincided with the Chunyun, a major travel season associated with the Chinese New Year holiday.
targetString: Ev epîdemî hevdem ket digel Chunyun, werza geştkirina têkildar bi betlanîyê Sersala Nûya Çînî.

sourceString: A number of events involving large crowds were cancelled by national and regional governments, including annual New Year festivals, with private companies also independently closing their shops and tourist attractions such as Hong Kong Disneyland and Shanghai Disneyland.
targetString: Hijmareke bûyeran ên ku girseyên mezin tê de cih digirtin hatin betalkirin ji hêla hikumeta netewî û cihî, ku di nav wan de Mihrîcana Sala Nû ya salane jî hebû, û pê re jî şîrketên taybet jî bi awayekî serbixwe dikanên xwe û cazibeyên tûrîstî yên wek Hong Kong Disneyland û Shanghai Disneyland girtin.

sourceString: Many Lunar New Year events and tourist attractions have been closed to prevent mass gatherings, including the Forbidden City in Beijing and traditional temple fairs.
targetString: Gelek çalakiyên Sala Nû ya Hîvê û cazîbeyên tûrîstî hatin girtin ji bo pêşîlêgirtina girseyên mezin, ku di nav wan de Bajarê Qedexe yê Beijingê û fuarên perestgehê yên kevneşopî jî hebûn.

sourceString: In 24 of China's 31 provinces, municipalities and regions, authorities extended the New Year's holiday to 10 February, instructing most workplaces not to re-open until that date.
targetString: Ji 31 eyaletên Çînê di 24an de, di şaredarî û herêman de, rayedaran betlaneya Sala Nû dirêj kirin 10ê Reşemiyê, û telîmat dan kargehan da ku heya wê rojê ji nû ve venebin.

sourceString: These regions represented 80% of the country's GDP and 90% of exports.
targetString: Wan herêman 80%ê GDPya welêt û 90%ê ixracatan temsîl dikir.

sourceString: Hong Kong raised its infectious disease response level to the highest and declared an emergency, closing schools until March and cancelling its New Year celebrations.The retail sector has been impacted globally, with reductions in store hours or temporary closures.
targetString: Hong Kong asta bersiva xwe bi nexweşîya vegirtî bi bilindtirîn kir û haleta bilez ragihand, xwendingehên heta meha Adar daxist û ahengên Sersal Nû betal kir. Keta takfiros di cihan ketin ber tesîr, û saeta firoş an daxistina demkîya wan ji kêm bibû.

sourceString: Visits to retailers in Europe and Latin America declined by 40%.
targetString: Serdanên takfiroşên di Ewrûpa û Emrîka ya Latîn heta 40% kêm kirî ye.

sourceString: North America and Middle East retailers saw a 50–60% drop.
targetString: Takfirosên Emrîkayê Bakçr û Rojhilata Navîn ji 50–60% daşikandin dît.

sourceString: This also resulted in a 33–43% drop in foot traffic to shopping centres in March compared to February.
targetString: Vê her wisa di Adarê de li gor Reşemiyê encama ketina bi qasî 33–43% a trafîka çûyîna peyatî ya bo navendên kirînfirotinê derxist holê.

sourceString: Shopping mall operators around the world imposed additional measures, such increased sanitation, installation of thermal scanners to check the temperature of shoppers, and cancellation of events.According to a United Nations Economic Commission for Latin America estimate, the pandemic-induced recession could leave between 14 and 22 million more people in extreme poverty in Latin America than would have been in that situation without the pandemic.
targetString: Kargerên navêndên kirînfirotinê yên derûdora cîhanê pîvanên zêdeyî derxistin, wek paqijkariya zêdekirî, bicihkirina kamerayên termal da ku agirê laşê mişteriyan bipîvin, û betalkirina çalakiyan. Li gor texmîneke Komîsyona Aborî ya Neteweyên Yekbûyî ya ji bo Amarîkaya Latîn, kêmkirina aborî ya ku pandemî-handayî dikare navbera 14 û 22 milyon mirovên din jî zêdetir bixe nav feqiriya giran li Amerîkaya Latîn ku di şert û mercên bêyî pandemîyê de rewşa wan wisa nedibû.

sourceString: In January and February 2020, during the height of the epidemic in Wuhan, about 5 million people in China lost their jobs.
targetString: Di Rêbendan û Reşemiya 2020an de, li heyama lûtkeya epîdemiyê li Wuhanê, nêzikî 5 milyon mirovan li Çînê karên xwe winda kirin.

sourceString: Many of China's nearly 300 million rural migrant workers have been stranded at home in inland provinces or trapped in Hubei province.In March 2020, more than 10 million Americans lost their jobs and applied for government aid.
targetString: Piraniya 300 milyon karkerên demsalî yên çolterê yên Çînî li eyaletên navîn di malan de asê mane an jî li eyaleta Hubei hatine zeftkirin. Di Adara 2020an de, zêdetirî 10 milyon Amerîkayiyan karên xwe winda kirin û serlêdana alîkariya hikumetê kirin.

sourceString: The coronavirus outbreak could cost 47 million jobs in the United States and unemployment rate may hit 32%, according to estimates by the Federal Reserve Bank of St. Louis.The lockdown in India has left tens of millions of Indian migrant workers (who are paid through daily wages) unemployed.The survey from the Angus Reid Institute found that 44% of Canadian households have experienced some type of unemployment.Nearly 900,000 workers lost their jobs in Spain since it went into lockdown in mid-March 2020.
targetString: Li gorî texmînên ji hêla Banka Federal Reserve St. Louis, belavbûna vayûrsa korona dibe sedme lêcûna 47 mîlyon kar di Emrîka û rêjeya bêkariyê dibe ku% 32 be. Girtina li Hindistanê bi dehan mîlyon xebatkarên koçberên Hindî (kesên ku bi meaşên rojane têne dayîn) bêkar hiştin. pirsyarname ji Ennistîtû ya Angus Reid ragihandk u 44% a malbatên Kenedayî curek bêşolî tecrûbe kirine. Teqrîben 900,000 karker di Spanya kara xwe ji dest da, çimku kara wan ji navena-Adar a 2020 hate daxistin.

sourceString: During the second half of March, 4 million French workers applied for temporary unemployment benefits and 1 million British workers applied for a universal credit scheme.Almost half a million companies in Germany have sent their workers on a government-subsidized short-time working schemes known as Kurzarbeit.
targetString: Di nîveya dûyema meha Adarê, 4 milyon karkerên ferensî daxwaz bênefîtên demkîya bêşolî û 1 milyon karkerên Birîtanyayî ji daxwaza bernameya krêdîta cihanî kirin. Teqrîn nîv ji yêk milyon kompanyayên nav Elmanya karkerên xwe nardin bernameyên karkirin dem-kurt a hikûmet peredayî ku bi Kurzarbeit tête nas kirin.

sourceString: The German short-time work compensation scheme has been adopted by France and Britain.
targetString: Şemaya xebata kurt-dem a Almanî ji aliyê Fransa û Brîtanyayê jî hat pêkanîn.

sourceString: The performing arts and cultural heritage sectors have been profoundly affected by the pandemic, impacting organizations' operations as well as individuals—both employed and independent—globally.
targetString: Beşa pêşkêşkirina hûner û kelepûra nerîtî kete ber bandora wî nexwşîyê, ku tesîr kirî ye sr çalakîya rêkxistin û herosa kesên- ku di cihan de karkir an serxwe bûn.

sourceString: Arts and culture sector organizations attempted to uphold their (often publicly funded) mission to provide access to cultural heritage to the community, maintain the safety of their employees and the public, and support artists where possible.
targetString: Rêxistinên sektera huner û çand hewl dan ku mîsyona xwe (bi gelemperî bi bûdceya giştî) biparêzin ku gihîştina mîrasa çandîya civakê, ewlehiya karmendên xwe û hemî biparêzin, û li her cihek ku mumkîn be piştgirî bikin.

sourceString: By March 2020, across the world and to varying degrees, museums, libraries, performance venues, and other cultural institutions had been indefinitely closed with their exhibitions, events and performances cancelled or postponed.
targetString: Hetaa Adarê 2020, di hemî cîhan û bi asteke cudah ji, mozexane, pirtûkxane, cihên şanpû û demezrandîyên dinhatine daxistin û pîşangeh, bûyer û karan wan ji hetine betalkirin an paşvexistin.

sourceString: In response there were intensive efforts to provide alternative services through digital platforms.Another recent and rapidly accelerating fallout of the disease is the cancellation of religious services, major events in sports, and other social events, such as music festivals and concerts, technology conferences, and fashion shows.
targetString: Wek bersiv helwldanên mezin hebûn ji bo dabînkirina xizmetên alternatîf bi rêya platformên dîjîtal. Bandoreke din a xirab a nexweşiyê ku wan rojan û zûka derket holê betalkirina xizmetên dînî, çalakiyên sereke yên werzîşê, û bûyerên din ên civakî, yên wek festîvalên muzîkê û konsert, konferansên teknolojiyê, û nimayişên modeyê bû.

sourceString: The film industry has also experienced disruption.The Vatican announced that Holy Week observances in Rome, which occur during the last week of the Christian penitential season of Lent, have been cancelled.
targetString: Pîşesazîya fîlm ji kete ber bêrevin. Vatîka ragihand ku lênêrîna Holy Week di Rom ragihand, ku di hefteya dawî ya werza jûvanî ya Lent rû dide hate betalkirin.

sourceString: Many dioceses have recommended older Christians to stay at home rather than attending Mass on Sundays; some churches have made church services available via radio, online live streaming or television while others are offering drive-in worship.
targetString: Gelek olên ji xirîstiyanên pîr re pêşniyar kirine ku li şûna xwe di Yekşemê di Mass de beşdarî bibin; Hinek dêran karûbarên dêrê bi riya radyo, pexşa onlayn an televîzyonê encam dan, dema ku kesên din xwestin biçin perestiyê dikin.

sourceString: With the Roman Catholic Diocese of Rome closing its churches and chapels and St. Peter's Square emptied of Christian pilgrims, other religious bodies also cancelled services and limited public gatherings in churches, mosques, synagogues, temples and gurdwaras.
targetString: Bi biryara Pîskoposiya Romayê ya Roman Katolîk ya girtina dêr û şapelan û bi valakirina Qada St. Peter a ji hacîyên Xirîstiyan, saziyên din ên dînî jî xizmet betal kirin û berhevbûnên dînî li dêr, camî, sînagog, perestgeh û gurdwarasan sînordar kirin.

sourceString: Iran's Health Ministry announced the cancellation of Friday prayers in areas affected by the outbreak and shrines were later closed, while Saudi Arabia banned the entry of foreign pilgrims as well as its residents to holy sites in Mecca and Medina.
targetString: Wezareta Saxlemî ya Iranê ragihand ku betalkirina nivîja Înî di cihên tûşbû bi sedema belavbûn û di dawî de zyartegehên jî hate daxistin, de heman dem de Erebistan Seûdî hatina zîyaretkerên biîyanî û rûniştinvanên we jî ji bo cihên pîroza Mekke û Medîne qedexe kir.

sourceString: The pandemic has caused the most significant disruption to the worldwide sporting calendar since the Second World War.
targetString: Ev gistgirtî bûye sedema xelela berceste di teqwîma spora cihanê ku di Cenga Dûwema Cîhanî wûsa nebûye.

sourceString: Most major sporting events have been either cancelled or postponed, including the 2019–20 UEFA Champions League, 2019–20 Premier League, UEFA Euro 2020, 2019–20 NBA season, and 2019–20 NHL season.
targetString: Piranî ya bûyerên girîngên werzîşê hatine betalkirin an paşvexistin, di nav wan de, sezona 2019–20 UEFA Champions League, 2019–20 Premier League, UEFA Euro 2020, demsala 2019–20 NBA û sezona NHL 2019–20.

sourceString: The outbreak disrupted plans for the 2020 Summer Olympics, which were originally scheduled to start at the end of July; the International Olympic Committee announced on 24 March that the event will be "rescheduled to a date beyond 2020 but not later than summer 2021".Casinos and other gaming venues worldwide have closed and live poker tournaments have been either postponed or cancelled.
targetString: Wî belavbûna planê Olîmpêka Havînî ya 2020, ku biryar bû di dawîya meha Tîrmeh dest pê bike xerab kir; Komîteya Olîmpîk a Navneteweyî di 24 ê Adar ê ragihand ku bûyer dê "ji nû ve di demeke din disala 2020an tête birêvebrin lê ev nahête paşxistin heta havîna 2021". Casino û cihên lîstikêên din ji li seranserê cîhanê hate daxsistin û kêbirkêya zindî ya poker ji hatine paşvexistin an betalkirin.

sourceString: This has led many gamblers to move online, with many online gambling sites reporting significant increases in their rates of new sign-ups.The entertainment industry has also been affected, with various music groups suspending or cancelling concert tours.
targetString: Vê yekê rêya gelek qumarleyîzan da ber bi online, li gel vê gelek malperên qumarleyîstinê zêdebûna rejeyên xwe yên tê-ketinan ragihandin. Endistriya şahiyê jî bandor wergirt, ku çendîn komên muzîkê gerên xwe yên konseran rawestandin an jî betal kirin.

sourceString: Many large theatres such as those on Broadway also suspended all performances.
targetString: Gelek ji teatra mezin wekî wan ku di Broadway de ye hemî icrayên wan ji hatîye hilawîstin.

sourceString: Some artists have explored ways to continue to produce and share work over the internet as an alternative to traditional live performance, such as live streaming concerts or creating web-based "festivals" for artists to perform, distribute, and publicize their work.
targetString: Hinek ji hunermendan lê rêyên ji bo domandina çêkirin û parvekirina kar di Înternêt digerin ku weke cêgirek ji bo encamdana jiyana kevn, weke pexşa zînî ya konsert an çêkirina "festîvalên" ser-tor, belavkirina kar xwe jî.

sourceString: Online, numerous coronavirus-themed Internet memes have spread as many turn to humour and distraction amid uncertainty.
targetString: Ji ser înternetê ji, hinek gotinên li ser koronavayrûs weke nukte û jibîrbirin di navbera ne-emînî ji belav bûye.

sourceString: Since the outbreak of COVID-19, heightened prejudice, xenophobia, and racism have been noted toward people of Chinese and East Asian descent, and against people from hotspots in Europe, the United States and other countries.
targetString: Piştî belavbûna KOVÎD-19, pêşbaverî, tirs û regezperiştî di hember xelkên Çîn û Asîyaya Rojhila û Kesên ku li Ewrûpa, Emrîka û welatên din tênn zêde bûye.

sourceString: Incidents of fear, suspicion, and hostility have been observed in many countries, particularly in Europe, East Asia, North America, and the Asia-Pacific region.
targetString: Bûyerên tirs, şikberî, û neyartiyê di gelek welatan de hatin dîtin, bi taybetî li Ewropa, Asya Rojhilat, Amerîkaya Bakur, û herêma Asya-Pasîfîk.

sourceString: Reports from February (when the majority of the cases had still been confined to China) have documented racist sentiments expressed in various groups worldwide of Chinese people deserving the virus or receiving what has been claimed as justified retribution.
targetString: Raporên di mehaa Sibatê (di demek ku piranîya haletan di Çîn girtine) hestên nejadperistî radigihîne di çend kom di asta cihanî di hember xelkê Çînî ku vayrûs girtine an ev ku wekî bergîdana teyîdkirî ya hatîye îdaa kirin.

sourceString: Some countries in Africa have also seen a rise in anti-Chinese sentiment.
targetString: Hin ji welatên di Efrîq zêdebûneke di dijbera soza Çînîe dît.

sourceString: Many residents of Wuhan and Hubei have reported discrimination based on their regional origin.
targetString: Gelek ji rûniştinvanên Wuhan û Hûbey cudahkarî li ser esasa bingeha deverîya wan rapor kirine.

sourceString: There has been support for the Chinese, both on and offline, and towards those in virus-stricken areas.
targetString: Piştevanî ji bo Çînîyên hebû, herdûya onlayn û oflayn, û ji bo kesên di cihên vegirtî bi vayrûs.

sourceString: Following the progression of the outbreak to new hotspot countries, people from Italy, the first country in Europe to experience a serious outbreak of COVID-19, could also be subjected to suspicion and xenophobia.Citizens in countries including Malaysia, New Zealand, Singapore, and South Korea initially signed petitions lobbying to ban Chinese people from entering their countries in an effort to stop the disease.
